short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize URLs by groups and open all with a single click, simplifying access and boosting productivity for task-specific browsing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Organized URL Groups for One-Click Access

Group URLs by Category: Easily organize URLs into custom categories like Work, School, or Fun to keep related links together.

Quick Access to Multiple Sites: Open all URLs in a group with a single click, saving time when revisiting frequently-used sites.

Enhanced Productivity: Access task-specific sites without searching or typing, ideal for focused work sessions, research, or study.

Flexible Management: Easily add, update, or delete URLs and categories to keep your workspace organized as needs change.

Error Prevention: The tool automatically checks if a URL already exists in a category, helping avoid duplicates.

Simple User Interface: A clean, intuitive layout makes saving and managing URLs straightforward for users of all skill levels.

This feature is designed to streamline browsing, allowing users to open related sites instantly, minimize distractions, and improve workflow efficiency.
